title: Retirement Advisor: Come On The Amazing Journey
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The retirement journey that people dream of is actually a sort of journey, one which they burden by overpacking. This podcast (5:27) suggests that it behooves investors to think about what they will “pack” for that retirement journey long before they’re going to take it; doing so may help frame decisions as to what they need today versus what they will need in retirement.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
